alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sanpete and east central Juab Counties through 400 PM MDT... At 329 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Moroni, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moroni, Mount Pleasant, Wales, Fairview, Fountain Green and Levan. This includes US Route 89 between mile markers 268 and 276, and between mile markers 278 and 288. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall and accumulating hail is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Sanpete Valley; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
